definition: to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
having nothing better to do/see 吃飽撐著|吃饱撑着
pinyin: chi1 bao3 le5 fan4 cheng1 de5

sentences.english: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
sentences.chinese: 我们投降埃及人和亚述人，为要得粮吃饱。

sentences.english: Complete according to " had eaten in the morning, satiate midday, eat in the evening little " principle.
sentences.chinese: 完全按照“早上吃好，中午吃饱，晚上吃少”的原则。

sentences.english: I rely on my parents to feed and clothe me.
sentences.chinese: 我仰赖父母让我吃饱穿暖。

sentences.english: Smaller bites also help your body realize when it’s full.
sentences.chinese: 小口吃饭也容易让你的身体认识到自己吃饱了。

sentences.english: A dime sometimes meant the difference between eating and starving.
sentences.chinese: 有时候一角钱意味着吃饱还是挨饿。

sentences.english: It is said that such fish and shrimp eat won't eat qu yuan's body.
sentences.chinese: 据说这样鱼虾吃饱了就不会去吃屈原的尸体。

sentences.english: He is a bachelor; once he is fed no one is hungry in his family.
sentences.chinese: 他是光棍儿一条，一人吃饱全家不饿。

sentences.english: Normally, the hormone leptinsignals to the brain you’ve eaten enough.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，瘦素会向大脑发送你已经吃饱的信号。

sentences.english: After they had eaten, he would round them up3) and walk back home.
sentences.chinese: 羊儿吃饱后，他便将羊儿赶拢起来回家。

sentences.english: We are full now. Could you cancel the Pork Ravioli please?
sentences.chinese: 我们已经吃饱了，您能帮我们取消无锡小笼包么？

sentences.english: There are people who wake up and their biggest concern is getting fed.
sentences.chinese: 有些人一醒来最在意的就是吃饱喝足。

sentences.english: At this time, the small white rabbit to eat, sleep is sweet.
sentences.chinese: 这时候，小白兔吃饱了，睡得正甜哩。

sentences.english: Lets chow down before we go.
sentences.chinese: 我们先吃饱饭再出发吧。

sentences.english: Excuse me, may I have another serving of the meal? I am still hungry. Thanks.
sentences.chinese: 对不起这份饭还没有让我吃饱，可以再给我一份吗？

sentences.english: You haven't fed enough. I can tell by your color.
sentences.chinese: 你还没有吃饱，我从你的脸色上可以看得出来。

sentences.english: After lunch, we went to Merlion. It's a local landmark.
sentences.chinese: 吃饱后，我们去看鱼尾狮，那是当地的地标。

definition: to feed to the full/to cram
to eat one's fill/to be full
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
sound made by an empty stomach
